name: Sonic Transitions
description:
Thank you for checking out Sonic Transitions!
This is my attempt to create a game that will eventually connect the events of Sonic SatAM to Sonic 1. This game is still horrendously unfinished, but I'm excited to let you try what's here!

Take control of either Sonic or Sally. Blast through the Free Territories of Mobius and put a stop to Snively's invasion!

Introducing the new and improved Homing Bash!
While curled up in the air, press and hold the Jump button near an enemy, press and hold the direction you would like to go, and release the Jump button to dash away!
